ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.2_0: At that time the nuns who were the pupils of the nun Thullanandā were socializing and behaving badly, had a bad reputation, and were harassing the Sangha of nuns and hiding each other’s offenses.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.3_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.4_0: “How can nuns behave in this way?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.5_0: “Is it true, monks, that nuns are behaving like this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.8_0: “... How can nuns behave in this way?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.9_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.10_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.11.1_0: ‘If nuns socialize, behave badly, have a bad reputation, are notorious, harass the Sangha of nuns, and hide each other’s offenses,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.12_0: then the nuns should correct them like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.13_0: “Sisters, you socialize, behave badly, have a bad reputation, are notorious, harass the Sangha of nuns, and hide each other’s offenses.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.14_0: The Sangha praises seclusion for the Sisters.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.15_0: If those nuns still continue as before, the nuns should press them up to three times to make them stop.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.16_0: If they then stop, all is well.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.17_0: If they do not stop, then after the third announcement those nuns too have committed an offense entailing sending away and suspension.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.2_0: fully ordained is what is meant.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.4_0: they socialize with improper bodily and verbal action.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.8_0: a bad reputation has spread about them.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.10_0: they make a living by means of a bad and wrong livelihood.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.12_0: they object on each other’s behalf when a legal procedure is being carried out against them.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.14_0: hiding each other with each other:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.18_0: Other nuns should correct her like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.19_0: “Sisters, you socialize, behave badly, have a bad reputation, are notorious, harass the Sangha of nuns, and hide each other’s offenses.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.20_0: The Sangha praises seclusion for the Sisters.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.21_0: They should correct them a second
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.23_0: If they stop, all is well.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.24_0: If they do not stop, they commit an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.25_0: If those who heard about it do not say anything, they commit an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.26_0: Those nuns, even if they have to be pulled into the Sangha, should be corrected like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.27_0: “Sisters, you socialize, behave badly, have a bad reputation, are notorious, harass the Sangha of nuns, and hide each other’s offenses.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.28_0: The Sangha praises seclusion for the Sisters.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.29_0: They should correct them a second
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.31_0: If they stop, all is well.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.32_0: If they do not stop, they commit an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.34_0: “And, monks, they should be pressed like this.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.35_0: A competent and capable nun should inform the Sangha:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.36_0: ‘Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.37_0: So-and-so and nuns so-and-so are behaving badly, have a bad reputation, are notorious, harass the Sangha of nuns, and hide each other’s offenses.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.38_0: And they keep on doing it.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.39_0: If it seems appropriate to the Sangha, the Sangha should press them to make them stop.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.41_0: ‘Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.42_0: So-and-so and nuns so-and-so are behaving badly, have a bad reputation, are notorious, harass the Sangha of nuns, and hide each other’s offenses.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.43_0: And they keep on doing it.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.44_0: The Sangha presses them to make them stop.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.45_0: Any nun who approves of pressing them to make them stop should remain silent.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.46_0: Any nun who does not approve should speak up.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.48_0: For the third time I speak on this matter. ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.49_0: The Sangha has pressed the nuns so-and-so and so-and-so to stop.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.50_0: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I will remember it thus.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.51_0: After the motion, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.52_0: After each of the first two announcements, she commits a serious offense.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.53_0: When the last announcement is finished, she commits an offense entailing suspension.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.54_0: If they commit the offense entailing suspension, the offense of wrong conduct and the serious offenses are annulled.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.55_0: Two or three may be pressed together, but not more than that.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.57_0: this is said with reference to the preceding offenses.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.59_0: there is an offense when they have been pressed for the third time, not as soon as the misconduct has been committed.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.61_0: she is sent away from the Sangha.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.62_0: He commits an offense entailing suspension:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.63_0: ... Therefore, too, it is called “an offense entailing suspension”.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.2.1_0: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, and they perceive it as such, and they do not stop, they commit an offense entailing suspension.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.2.2_0: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but they are unsure of it, and they do not stop, they commit an offense entailing suspension.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.2.3_0: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but they perceive it as illegitimate, and they do not stop, they commit an offense entailing suspension.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.2.4_0: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, but she perceives it as legitimate, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.2.5_0: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, but they are unsure of it, they commit an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.2.6_0: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, and she perceives it as such, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.3.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.3.2_0: if she has not been pressed;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.3.5_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.3.6_0: The twelfth offense entailing suspension is finished.
